1. Please sit quietly until your instructor provides a code to begin the group quiz.
 2. The members of your group are listed above. Please do not begin interacting with them until the instructor provides the code to begin.
 3. Your group will repeat the questions in the previous quiz, this time discussing your answer choices as a group until you come to an agreement.
 4. If the answer your group chose was incorrect, choose a new answer after discussing further. Repeat until the quiz is complete.
